com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition

Class SpenSignatureVerificationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.recognition.SpenSignatureVerificationManager

  • public final class SpenSignatureVerificationManager
extends Object
    This class provides the methods for managing SpenSignatureVerification instance.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String SPEN_SIGNATURE
      The full class name of the preloaded SignaturePlugin.

                                InstantiationException,

        Parameters:
        info - The signature verification information object.
        Returns:
        The private key hint.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        InstantiationException - Thrown when the constructor is not accessible for instantiation.
        IllegalAccessException - Thrown when the class methods are not accessible.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the candidate list is not created.

      • createSignatureVerification

        public SpenSignatureVerification createSignatureVerification(SpenSignatureVerificationInfo info)
                                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                                             SpenCreationFailureException,
                                                             Exception
        Create an SpenSignatureVerification instance with the specified signature verification information from the candidate information list.
        You can get the information by calling getInfoList()
        Parameters:
        info - The signature verification information object.
        Returns:
        The SpenSignatureVerification instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the signature verification instance cannot be created.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the candidate list is not created.
        Exception - Thrown if the signature verification engine returns an error.

      • createSignatureVerification

        public SpenSignatureVerification createSignatureVerification(SpenSignatureVerificationInfo info,
                                                    String key)
                                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                                             SpenCreationFailureException,
                                                             Exception
        Create an SpenSignatureVerification instance with the specified signature verification information from the candidate list and the specified key.
        You can get the information by calling getInfoList()
        Parameters:
        info - The signature verification information object.
        key - The private key.
        Returns:
        The SpenSignatureVerification instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the signature verification instance cannot be created.
        IllegalStateException - Thrown when the candidate list is not created.
        Exception - Thrown if the signature verification engine returns an error.

      • createSignatureVerification

        public SpenSignatureVerification createSignatureVerification(String className)
                                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                                             SpenCreationFailureException,
                                                             Exception
        Create an SpenSignatureVerification instance with the specified class name.
        If you know the name of the package and class, you can call this method directly without creating a candidate list.
        Parameters:
        className - The full class name of the recognition plug–in.
        Returns:
        The SpenSignatureVerification instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the signature verification instance cannot be created.
        Exception - Thrown if the signature verification engine returns an error.

      • createSignatureVerification

        public SpenSignatureVerification createSignatureVerification(String className,
                                                    String key)
                                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                                             SpenCreationFailureException,
                                                             Exception
        Create an SpenSignatureVerification instance with the specified class name and key.
        If you already know the name of the package and class, you can call this method directly without creating a candidate list.
        Parameters:
        className - The full class name of the recognition plug–in.
        key - The private key.
        Returns:
        The SpenSignatureVerification instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the information passed is null.
        ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when the class loader is unable to find the specified class.
        SpenCreationFailureException - Thrown when the signature verification instance cannot be created.
        Exception - Thrown if the signature verification engine returns an error.

      • destroySignatureVerification

        public void destroySignatureVerification(SpenSignatureVerification verification)
        Destroy the currently loaded signature verification plug-in instance.
        Parameters:
        verification - The SpenSignatureVerification instance.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown when the signature verification engine is not loaded.
